page.title: 12BUILTH (W): EDUC,(SECONDARY)
page.content: The high school began life as Builth County School in 1896.The oldest part of the present school dates from 1899 and there is an odd mixture of buildings to house the 430 pupils of this 11 to 18,three-form entry mixed comprehensive school.Except for the original stone building of 1899,the rest of the school is due to be rebuilt,on its present site, at any moment.Everyone waits expectantly !!!! Several generations of local people have been educated at the high school.However an increasing number of pupils are not from a local background:a recent random sample of pupils showed that up to thirty percent of pupils had come in to the area from elsewhere.
